name: academic_year
description: The academic year this record refers to (e.g., '2024-25').

name: county_name
description: Name of the county where the school is located.

name: district_name
description: Name of the school district that operates the school.

name: school_type
description: Type of school (e.g., Elementary, Middle, High, Charter).

name: status
description: Operational status of the school (e.g., Active, Closed).

name: open_date
description: Open date as text from source (e.g., '7/1/1980 12:00:00 AM').

name: city
description: City where the school is located.

name: zip
description: ZIP or postal code for the schoolâ€™s location.

name: latitude
description: Latitude coordinate of the school (WGS84 format).

name: longitude
description: Longitude coordinate of the school (WGS84 format).

name: enroll_total
description: Total number of enrolled students at the school.

name: african_american
description: Percentage of students identified as African American.

name: hispanic
description: Percentage of students identified as Hispanic or Latino.

name: asian
description: Percentage of students identified as Asian.
